flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This will show you what Scooby has done in the past year.
guide.introduction_rendered: This will show you what Scooby has done in the past year.

lines.text: This picture was taken at a Harmony series in Parish, New York. At the end of the year they took Rezerved Champion! This was Scooby's first series that involved cantering. This was also one of Scooby's first series!
lines.text_raw: This picture was taken at a Harmony series in Parish, New York. At the end of the year they took Rezerved Champion! This was Scooby's first series that involved cantering. This was also one of Scooby's first series!

lines.text: "Every time we passed the camera...Scooby always out his ears up at the walk. When we were cantering or trotting, he left his head down and just put up his ears!" said Megan (rider).
lines.text_raw: "Every time we passed the camera...Scooby always out his ears up at the walk. When we were cantering or trotting, he left his head down and just put up his ears!" said Megan (rider).

lines.text: At the end of the day they always felt accomplished! As the show season went on, Scooby and the rest of his team progressed! They look forward to the Pinto series in the year of 2012 tom make their biggest accomplishment yet!
lines.text_raw: At the end of the day they always felt accomplished! As the show season went on, Scooby and the rest of his team progressed! They look forward to the Pinto series in the year of 2012 tom make their biggest accomplishment yet!

guide.summary: This will show you all about Scooby and his life.
guide.title: "Moons Final Fling"
